description.value: As a standard action, you can target a 10-foot burst within 60 feet of you with a glitter bomb. This explodes harmlessly, but all creatures and objects in the area are coated with adhesive glitter, negating invisibility effects for 1 minute. All creatures in the area are @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.YjE6UGzwOTfO9p4g]{dazzled} for 1 round and must immediately attempt a Reflex save (DC = 10 + half your character level + your key ability modifier) or be @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.tOpF6qjnlnKc10t7]{blinded} for 1 round per 2 of your character levels ([[floor(@details.level.values/2)]]). Each round at the end of their turn, blinded creatures can attempt new saving throws to end the blindness effect.
